content:
Both Raby Castle and the Bowes Museum are great places to visit, and which one you choose to visit first really depends on your personal interests. Here is a brief overview of each attraction to help you decide:

- Raby Castle: Raby Castle is a medieval castle located in Staindrop. The castle has a rich history and is surrounded by beautiful gardens and a Deer Park. Visitors can explore the castle's grand interiors and learn about the lives of the people who lived there. If you're interested in history, architecture, and gardens, Raby Castle could be a great first choice. - Bowes Museum: The Bowes Museum is an art and design museum located in Barnard Castle. The museum features a wide variety of exhibits, including paintings, sculptures, and textiles. It also has stunning galleries and gardens. If you're interested in art, design, and architecture, the Bowes Museum could be a great first choice. Ultimately, both attractions are well worth visiting. If you have the time, you may want to visit both during your stay in the area.
